entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
